name: node-enocean-ble
description: The node-enocean-ble monitors and parses telegrams coming from EnOcean BLE devices (rocker wall switch and multisensor). This module supports telegram authentication based on AES128 in CCM (Counter with CBC-MAC) mode and replayed telegram detection.
author: Futomi Hatano <futomi.hatano@gmail.com> (https://github.com/futomi)
